commit message:
Fix the ? (THAL) character at the top left of the Arabic keymap

The keymap contained a stray SHADDA modifier which was invisible in my usual
editor, leading to confusion. (Thanks to Mohsen Abbasi for his patient
corrections.)

Add portugu?s (pt_PT) layout

Contributed by joao

Minor tweaks by me - I added the non-dead `^~ characters as alternates, and made a few escaping fixes.
